page.title: 16Customs we Celebrate
page.content: On{New Year's Eve}many people have a party.At midnight they wish their friends a Happy{New Year}and drink to their health.At{Easter}we remember the {crucifixion}of{Jesus.}People go to {churches}or{chapels}which are decorated with Spring flowers.We give each other cards and chocolate{Easter eggs.In{1605 Guy Fawkes}tried to blow up the{Houses of Parliament}but he failed.We celebrate this on{November {5th.Treloweth school}has a{bonfire}and there is a Guy competition.The Guys are burnt and there are fireworks.At {Christmas}we remember the birth of {Jesus.}There is a holiday on{Dec 25th and we give presents.Young children believe{Father Christmas}brings them. We have{Christmas}trees which are decorated and have special food such as{roast turkey}and{Christmas Pudding.
